feed.title: Understanding and Mitigating a OP_CTV Footgun: The Unsatisfiable UTXO

entry.title: Understanding and Mitigating a OP_CTV Footgun: The Unsatisfiable UTXO
entry.summary: I'm sorry, but it seems there wasn't any specific content provided from an email for me to summarize according to the guidelines you've given. Could you please provide the content or context of the email you'd like summarized into a blog post format?
